ValidationRule.description: This is to make sure that “New Account or Contact Information” section has enough information to be sent to Master Data team to create new Account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $RecordType.Id =$Label.BGA_Honeywell_Prospect && Account__c = NULL && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Sales Qualified Lead') && IF( ( Account_Phone__c = '' || Account_Address_line_1__c = '' || Account_City__c = '' || ISPICKVAL( Account_Country__c ,'') ), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values for 'Account Phone Number', 'Account Address line 1' , 'City Name' and 'Country Name' in "New Account or Contact Information" section.
